original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Hot Spring Water
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Hot Spring Water

original:
The Bath Salts are beyond this
door... Can you leave, now?
translation:
The Bath Salts are beyond this
door... Can you leave, now?

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Bath Salts
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Bath Salts

original:
Obtained a consumable item!
Revive
translation:
Obtained a consumable item!
Revive

original:
Obtained a consumable item!
Revive
translation:
Obtained a consumable item!
Revive

original:
Oh! ^P!
I have a request for you!
There's supposedly a legendary
place in Class Desert,
Where you can battle against a
golden-clad Digimon!
To have a golden-clad body is
my dream!
I'd love to go, myself, but
I've developed a terrible toothache!
Please go and investigate this
rumor in my stead!
translation:
Oh! ^P!
I have a request for you!
There's supposedly a legendary
place in Class Desert,
Where you can battle against a
golden-clad Digimon!
To have a golden-clad body is
my dream!
I'd love to go, myself, but
I've developed a terrible toothache!
Please go and investigate this
rumor in my stead!

original:
Ow ow ow...
If only my toothache was gone...!
Please go to Class Desert in my
place,
And face that golden-clad Digimon!
translation:
Ow ow ow...
If only my toothache was gone...!
Please go to Class Desert in my
place,
And face that golden-clad Digimon!

original:
Whoa, ^P!
You're incredible!
I can see the golden sparkling aura
coming from you!
I better train hard so I can 
challenge that Digimon, too!
Here's your reward!
translation:
Whoa, ^P!
You're incredible!
I can see the golden sparkling aura
coming from you!
I better train hard so I can 
challenge that Digimon, too!
Here's your reward!

original:
Just imagine it...
My shiny golden-clad body...
Yeah! So cool!
I need to train right away!
translation:
Just imagine it...
My shiny golden-clad body...
Yeah! So cool!
I need to train right away!

original:
If you want to become sparkling
gold, you must keep training!
Be sure to tell this to your friends
over in the Farm, too!
translation:
If you want to become sparkling
gold, you must keep training!
Be sure to tell this to your friends
over in the Farm, too!

original:
^P...
I'm so tired...
I'd like to go on a vacation...
But I don't know where to go...
On that note, I'd like you to make
a map for me...
Yeah... A map of all the locations
that contain water would be good...
First, could you go see Marine-
Angemon at Heritage Cape?
And then go look around the
world...?
translation:
^P...
I'm so tired...
I'd like to go on a vacation...
But I don't know where to go...
On that note, I'd like you to make
a map for me...
Yeah... A map of all the locations
that contain water would be good...
First, could you go see Marine-
Angemon at Heritage Cape?
And then go look around the
world...?

original:
Please go see MarineAngemon over
at Heritage Cape...
And then make a map of all the
places with water... Thank you.
translation:
Please go see MarineAngemon over
at Heritage Cape...
And then make a map of all the
places with water... Thank you.

original:
^P...
You made it back...
Could that be a completed map 
you're carrying there...?
Incredible...!
It's so detailed, too...
I'm grateful to you, ^P.
Please take this as thanks.
translation:
^P...
You made it back...
Could that be a completed map 
you're carrying there...?
Incredible...!
It's so detailed, too...
I'm grateful to you, ^P.
Please take this as thanks.

original:
Handed over Key Item!
Digital World Map
translation:
Handed over Key Item!
Digital World Map

original: I feel like I've travelled the world!
translation: I feel like I've travelled the world!

original:
Welcome to the Digital World
Stamp Rally!
Now let's work towards making
a completed map frame!
Once you gather all the Map Pieces
in this world and combine them...
You'll recieve a complete map,
just for you!
There are 4 Map Pieces hidden 
in chests in the following places...
Palette Amazon
Palace Laboratory
Angler Tunnel
Proxy Island
Get them all, and I'll give you a
special prize!
translation:
Welcome to the Digital World
Stamp Rally!
Now let's work towards making
a completed map frame!
Once you gather all the Map Pieces
in this world and combine them...
You'll recieve a complete map,
just for you!
There are 4 Map Pieces hidden 
in chests in the following places...
Palette Amazon
Palace Laboratory
Angler Tunnel
Proxy Island
Get them all, and I'll give you a
special prize!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Map Frame
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Map Frame

original:
There are 4 Map Pieces hidden 
in chests in the following places...
Palette Amazon
Palace Laboratory
Angler Tunnel
Proxy Island
Get them all, and I'll give you a
special prize!
translation:
There are 4 Map Pieces hidden 
in chests in the following places...
Palette Amazon
Palace Laboratory
Angler Tunnel
Proxy Island
Get them all, and I'll give you a
special prize!

original:
Welcome to the Digital World
Stamp Rally!
Congratulations!
You have found all the Map Pieces!
As promised, here is your reward!
translation:
Welcome to the Digital World
Stamp Rally!
Congratulations!
You have found all the Map Pieces!
As promised, here is your reward!

original:
Handed over Key Item
Map Frame
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Map Frame

original:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece A
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece A

original:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece B
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece B

original:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece C
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece C

original:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece D
translation:
Handed over Key Item
Map Piece D

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Digital World Map
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Digital World Map

original:
What a magnificent map!
Be sure to take good care of it!
translation:
What a magnificent map!
Be sure to take good care of it!

original:
^P!
I have a challenge for you!
Now that you've taken on quite
a few Digimon Quests...
It's time to put your skills to the
test!
Go to Shadow Hell and settle this
with some challengers!
translation:
^P!
I have a challenge for you!
Now that you've taken on quite
a few Digimon Quests...
It's time to put your skills to the
test!
Go to Shadow Hell and settle this
with some challengers!

original:
Go and defeat those waiting for 
you at Shadow Hell...
Show me the results of your
training!
translation:
Go and defeat those waiting for 
you at Shadow Hell...
Show me the results of your
training!

original:
Well done, ^P.

I am indeed grateful you came to
this world.
You truly are the most amazing
Tamer.
translation:
Well done, ^P.

I am indeed grateful you came to
this world.
You truly are the most amazing
Tamer.

original:
Do you still have anything you
need to do?
translation:
Do you still have anything you
need to do?

original:
As I thought... 
The rumors are true.
I never thought you would become
a Legendary Tamer.
I'll make you prove to me that
it wasn't just a fluke!
translation:
As I thought... 
The rumors are true.
I never thought you would become
a Legendary Tamer.
I'll make you prove to me that
it wasn't just a fluke!

original:
Hmph... I see.

You're the real deal, ^P.

It's a mystery to me, but I realize
I cannot compare to you...
But... I'm relieved.

You sure have gotten stronger!
Congratulations!
translation:
Hmph... I see.

You're the real deal, ^P.

It's a mystery to me, but I realize
I cannot compare to you...
But... I'm relieved.

You sure have gotten stronger!
Congratulations!

original:
You sure have gotten stronger!
Congratulations!
translation:
You sure have gotten stronger!
Congratulations!

original:
What's this? You've become a 
Legendary Tamer??
Heheh... Well, that's fine.
You'll be a good match for me!
translation:
What's this? You've become a 
Legendary Tamer??
Heheh... Well, that's fine.
You'll be a good match for me!

original:
I guess I wasn't ready for this...

Well, I guess it's fine. 
I accept my loss, 
...And your strength.
translation:
I guess I wasn't ready for this...

Well, I guess it's fine. 
I accept my loss, 
...And your strength.

original:
Well, I guess it's fine. 
I accept my loss, 
...And your strength.
translation:
Well, I guess it's fine. 
I accept my loss, 
...And your strength.

original:
For a Tamer, I can clearly see that
you are strong.
But I think you've gone too far
by becoming a Legendary Tamer.
Allow me, Uno, to show you...

That if you get carried away,
you're gonna get hurt!
translation:
For a Tamer, I can clearly see that
you are strong.
But I think you've gone too far
by becoming a Legendary Tamer.
Allow me, Uno, to show you...

That if you get carried away,
you're gonna get hurt!

original:
Jeez... In the end, I was the one
getting hurt...!
Damn it, you'd better remember this,
next time we meet...
I'll be the main character, and you'll
just be the underdog!
translation:
Jeez... In the end, I was the one
getting hurt...!
Damn it, you'd better remember this,
next time we meet...
I'll be the main character, and you'll
just be the underdog!

original:
Damn it, you'd better remember this,
next time we meet...
I'll be the main character, and you'll
just be the underdog!
translation:
Damn it, you'd better remember this,
next time we meet...
I'll be the main character, and you'll
just be the underdog!

original:
Rosemon BM is waiting for you
in the Farm, nume.
She's scary, so don't mind me,
just hurry and go see her, nume.
translation:
Rosemon BM is waiting for you
in the Farm, nume.
She's scary, so don't mind me,
just hurry and go see her, nume.

original:
So you're ^P?
You entered a password, right?
Due to that, I've been revived.
I thank you for that.
But I'm still not strong enough...
I need to finish my training,
Then I can be fully restored,
and ready for this world!
Go outside the DigiBase and 
accept training from the Tamers!
translation:
So you're ^P?
You entered a password, right?
Due to that, I've been revived.
I thank you for that.
But I'm still not strong enough...
I need to finish my training,
Then I can be fully restored,
and ready for this world!
Go outside the DigiBase and 
accept training from the Tamers!

original:
Go outside the DigiBase and 
accept training from the Tamers!
translation:
Go outside the DigiBase and 
accept training from the Tamers!

original:
In order to be fully restored, I need
a Blue Patch!
I'm counting on you, ^P!
translation:
In order to be fully restored, I need
a Blue Patch!
I'm counting on you, ^P!

original:
You cleared the training,
^P!
With this Blue Patch, I can be
fully restored!
Go to where the Patch was found 
and gather some scan data.
When we meet again, we're gonna
have some fun!
translation:
You cleared the training,
^P!
With this Blue Patch, I can be
fully restored!
Go to where the Patch was found 
and gather some scan data.
When we meet again, we're gonna
have some fun!

original:
The Blue Patch was found at
Patch Prairie.
Go and repair the Bug Plate that
you received,
Gather up some scan data in battle,
and then convert it!
See you later!
translation:
The Blue Patch was found at
Patch Prairie.
Go and repair the Bug Plate that
you received,
Gather up some scan data in battle,
and then convert it!
See you later!

original:
Hey, ^P.

I heard you had completed all your
training up until now.
Before we battle, I have one thing
I'd like to warn you about...
I am no longer the Shuu you once
knew!
There is something I've come to
realize about battle...
Everything relies on raw speed!
translation:
Hey, ^P.

I heard you had completed all your
training up until now.
Before we battle, I have one thing
I'd like to warn you about...
I am no longer the Shuu you once
knew!
There is something I've come to
realize about battle...
Everything relies on raw speed!

original:
That was amazing!
Well done, ^P!
Hm? How to restore 
UFVeedramon?
You should look for the Blue Patch
in Patch Prarie.
Once you've found it, hand it over
to UFVeedramon.
translation:
That was amazing!
Well done, ^P!
Hm? How to restore 
UFVeedramon?
You should look for the Blue Patch
in Patch Prarie.
Once you've found it, hand it over
to UFVeedramon.

original:
I can't believe it...

I thought with raw speed, I could
win everything...
I just feel devastated to lose like
this...
translation:
I can't believe it...

I thought with raw speed, I could
win everything...
I just feel devastated to lose like
this...

original:
Oh, ^P!

So you've completed all your 
training up until now, huh?
Before we battle, I have one thing
I better warn you about...
I am no longer the Kizuna you once
knew!
There is something I've come to
realize when it comes to battle...
Everything hinges on raw speed!
translation:
Oh, ^P!

So you've completed all your 
training up until now, huh?
Before we battle, I have one thing
I better warn you about...
I am no longer the Kizuna you once
knew!
There is something I've come to
realize when it comes to battle...
Everything hinges on raw speed!

original:
That was amazing!
You did well, ^P!
Huh? You want to know how to
restore UFVeedramon?
You should look for the Blue Patch
in Patch Prarie!
Once you've found it, go hand it 
over to UFVeedramon.
translation:
That was amazing!
You did well, ^P!
Huh? You want to know how to
restore UFVeedramon?
You should look for the Blue Patch
in Patch Prarie!
Once you've found it, go hand it 
over to UFVeedramon.

original:
I don't believe it...

I thought with raw speed, 
I would win everything...
I just feel terrible, losing like this...
translation:
I don't believe it...

I thought with raw speed, 
I would win everything...
I just feel terrible, losing like this...

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Blue Patch
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Blue Patch

original:
^P! I am grateful for you
restoring me!
However... This isn't enough.

In order to fully restore me to my
former glory,
There's one more task I need you
to do for me!
Please go and battle the Tamer
outside the DigiBase!
translation:
^P! I am grateful for you
restoring me!
However... This isn't enough.

In order to fully restore me to my
former glory,
There's one more task I need you
to do for me!
Please go and battle the Tamer
outside the DigiBase!

original:
Please go outside the DigiBase
and battle the Tamer waiting!
translation:
Please go outside the DigiBase
and battle the Tamer waiting!

original:
In order to be fully restored, 
I need a Black Patch!
Please go find one for me!
translation:
In order to be fully restored, 
I need a Black Patch!
Please go find one for me!

original:
Well done, ^P!
You sure are a great Tamer!
With this Black Patch, I can finally
be restored to my former glory!
Now go to where the Patch was 
located and gather scan data!
Then once you gather enough,
we can become partners!
Until we meet again, my friend!
translation:
Well done, ^P!
You sure are a great Tamer!
With this Black Patch, I can finally
be restored to my former glory!
Now go to where the Patch was 
located and gather scan data!
Then once you gather enough,
we can become partners!
Until we meet again, my friend!

original:
From where you found the Patch
at Login Mountain, there's a tunnel!
Just go through that tunnel and
you'll be able to gather scan data!
Once you have enough, and you tidy
up my Bug Plate,
You can then convert it and we'll
become partners!
See you again, friend!
translation:
From where you found the Patch
at Login Mountain, there's a tunnel!
Just go through that tunnel and
you'll be able to gather scan data!
Once you have enough, and you tidy
up my Bug Plate,
You can then convert it and we'll
become partners!
See you again, friend!

original:
Hey, ^P.

If you were born anew, would you
still choose me?
I got some iron-clad defensive 
skills, after all!
Such strong defense is extremely
useful during battle, you know!
But I'm sure you've heard all about
the importance of defense, right?
translation:
Hey, ^P.

If you were born anew, would you
still choose me?
I got some iron-clad defensive 
skills, after all!
Such strong defense is extremely
useful during battle, you know!
But I'm sure you've heard all about
the importance of defense, right?

original:
Not bad...
You really destroyed me.
Hm? You want to know how to
restore Craniamon?
In that case, I suggest you go and
find a Black Patch!
In order to find one, you first gotta
go to Login Mountain,
Then you'll find a deep tunnel, in 
there should be the Patch!
Once you find it, hand it over
to Craniamon!
translation:
Not bad...
You really destroyed me.
Hm? You want to know how to
restore Craniamon?
In that case, I suggest you go and
find a Black Patch!
In order to find one, you first gotta
go to Login Mountain,
Then you'll find a deep tunnel, in 
there should be the Patch!
Once you find it, hand it over
to Craniamon!

original:
No matter how tough the 
defense...
If they can't fight back, they may 
as well just be some boulder, eh?
translation:
No matter how tough the 
defense...
If they can't fight back, they may 
as well just be some boulder, eh?

original:
Hey, ^P.

If you were reborn, 
would you still choose me?
I got some iron-clad defensive 
skills, you know!
Such strong defense is extremely
useful during battle, you see!
But I'm sure you've heard all about
the importance of defense, right?
translation:
Hey, ^P.

If you were reborn, 
would you still choose me?
I got some iron-clad defensive 
skills, you know!
Such strong defense is extremely
useful during battle, you see!
But I'm sure you've heard all about
the importance of defense, right?

original:
You're pretty good...
Alright, you got me.
Hm? You want to know how to
restore Craniamon?
In that case, you should go and
find a Black Patch!
In order to find one, you first need 
to go to Login Mountain,
Then you'll find a deep tunnel, in 
there should be the Patch!
Once you find it, go give it to
Craniamon!
translation:
You're pretty good...
Alright, you got me.
Hm? You want to know how to
restore Craniamon?
In that case, you should go and
find a Black Patch!
In order to find one, you first need 
to go to Login Mountain,
Then you'll find a deep tunnel, in 
there should be the Patch!
Once you find it, go give it to
Craniamon!

original:
No matter how tough the 
defense...
If they can't fight back, they're as
useful as a stone in a field.
translation:
No matter how tough the 
defense...
If they can't fight back, they're as
useful as a stone in a field.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Black Patch
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Black Patch

original:
While I am indeed thankful to you 
for restoring me...
I'm still not back to my full
potential yet...
Please do this task for me, then
I will finally be restored!
First, go battle the Tamer outside
the DigiBase!
translation:
While I am indeed thankful to you 
for restoring me...
I'm still not back to my full
potential yet...
Please do this task for me, then
I will finally be restored!
First, go battle the Tamer outside
the DigiBase!

original:
Go outside the DigiBase and you'll
find the one you must challenge.
translation:
Go outside the DigiBase and you'll
find the one you must challenge.

original:
I need the Red Patch in order to
finally be fully restored.
Please hurry and get one!
translation:
I need the Red Patch in order to
finally be fully restored.
Please hurry and get one!

original:
I knew you could do it, ^P.

You are indeed worthy of becoming
my Tamer.
With that Red Patch, I can finally
be fully restored.
Return to the location you found the
Patch and gather scan data!
Once you do that, I can finally
fight by your side!
translation:
I knew you could do it, ^P.

You are indeed worthy of becoming
my Tamer.
With that Red Patch, I can finally
be fully restored.
Return to the location you found the
Patch and gather scan data!
Once you do that, I can finally
fight by your side!

original:
You need to go to where you found
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Gather scan data, repair my Bug 
Plate and then convert...
Got that? Don't go forgetting.
translation:
You need to go to where you found
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Gather scan data, repair my Bug 
Plate and then convert...
Got that? Don't go forgetting.

original:
Hey, ^P!
Perfect timing!
I've been hoping to show you this
new technique I got!
And now I'll get to beat you with
it!
No-one can escape it, this
super wide-range attack...
I dub it... Wide Attack!
translation:
Hey, ^P!
Perfect timing!
I've been hoping to show you this
new technique I got!
And now I'll get to beat you with
it!
No-one can escape it, this
super wide-range attack...
I dub it... Wide Attack!

original:
Why'd I lose...?
I bet it's due to the name I gave it.
What's that? You want to know
how to restore Examon...?
Well first I think you should go find
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Then return here and hand it over
to Examon.
Now where was Login Mountain,
again...?
Ah... I forgot!
translation:
Why'd I lose...?
I bet it's due to the name I gave it.
What's that? You want to know
how to restore Examon...?
Well first I think you should go find
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Then return here and hand it over
to Examon.
Now where was Login Mountain,
again...?
Ah... I forgot!

original:
Even if you have an attack with 
such a vast range...
It's just some flashy technique if
it doesn't have power behind it.
translation:
Even if you have an attack with 
such a vast range...
It's just some flashy technique if
it doesn't have power behind it.

original:
Hey, ^P!
Great timing!
I've been hoping to show you this
new technique!
And now I'll get to beat you with
it! This is great!
No-one can escape it, this
super wide-range attack...
I call it... Wide Attack!
translation:
Hey, ^P!
Great timing!
I've been hoping to show you this
new technique!
And now I'll get to beat you with
it! This is great!
No-one can escape it, this
super wide-range attack...
I call it... Wide Attack!

original:
I lost...?
It must be the lame name I gave it.
What's that? You want to know
how to restore Examon...?
Well first I think you should go find
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Then return here and hand it over
to Examon.
Where was Login Mountain,
again...?
Oops... I forgot!
translation:
I lost...?
It must be the lame name I gave it.
What's that? You want to know
how to restore Examon...?
Well first I think you should go find
the Red Patch at Login Mountain.
Then return here and hand it over
to Examon.
Where was Login Mountain,
again...?
Oops... I forgot!

original:
Even if you have an attack with 
such a vast range...
It's just some flashy technique if
it doesn't have power behind it.
translation:
Even if you have an attack with 
such a vast range...
It's just some flashy technique if
it doesn't have power behind it.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Red Patch
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Red Patch

original:
Thank you so much for restoring
me, ^P!
But you see...
There's one issue!
I'm not quite back to my full
strength yet...
So if you could accept this grueling
task I have to offer you...
Please go outside the DigiBase
and challenge the Tamer there!
translation:
Thank you so much for restoring
me, ^P!
But you see...
There's one issue!
I'm not quite back to my full
strength yet...
So if you could accept this grueling
task I have to offer you...
Please go outside the DigiBase
and challenge the Tamer there!

original:
Go challenge the Tamer waiting
outside the DigiBase!
translation:
Go challenge the Tamer waiting
outside the DigiBase!

original:
I require the Yellow Patch!
So hurry and bring it back!
translation:
I require the Yellow Patch!
So hurry and bring it back!

original:
Amazing, ^P!
You've even better than I expected!
With this Yellow Patch, we can
finally become partners!
You now need to gather scan data
from where you found the Patch!
Though, that's only if you can
defeat us...!
I'm so excited! Hurry over there
and face us!
translation:
Amazing, ^P!
You've even better than I expected!
With this Yellow Patch, we can
finally become partners!
You now need to gather scan data
from where you found the Patch!
Though, that's only if you can
defeat us...!
I'm so excited! Hurry over there
and face us!

original:
Did you forget, already?

The place where you found the 
Patch was underwater.
You just dive into the fountain
over at Packet Coast!
Then repair our Bug Plate,
gather scan data, and convert!
Don't forget this time, okay!
translation:
Did you forget, already?

The place where you found the 
Patch was underwater.
You just dive into the fountain
over at Packet Coast!
Then repair our Bug Plate,
gather scan data, and convert!
Don't forget this time, okay!

original:
Well if it isn't ^P.
You've come all this way...
...Only to face defeat against me.

I'm different now, I no longer have
any doubts.
The best defense is a good 
offense!
I believe in those words, and now
I'll prove them to you!
translation:
Well if it isn't ^P.
You've come all this way...
...Only to face defeat against me.

I'm different now, I no longer have
any doubts.
The best defense is a good 
offense!
I believe in those words, and now
I'll prove them to you!

original:
………

...How to restore Aegisdramon?

In that case you'll need a Yellow
Patch.
First dive into the fountain over
at Packet Coast.
Then find the Patch and bring it 
back to Aegisdramon.
That's all.
translation:
………

...How to restore Aegisdramon?

In that case you'll need a Yellow
Patch.
First dive into the fountain over
at Packet Coast.
Then find the Patch and bring it 
back to Aegisdramon.
That's all.

original:
Even if I focus solely on pure, raw
power...
Without a good defense, 
it's useless.
I'm still a little stunned...
translation:
Even if I focus solely on pure, raw
power...
Without a good defense, 
it's useless.
I'm still a little stunned...

original:
Well if it isn't ^P.
You've come all this way...
...Only to face defeat against me.

I'm different now, you know?
I no longer have any doubts.
The best defense is a good 
offense!
I believe in those words, 
and I'll prove it!
translation:
Well if it isn't ^P.
You've come all this way...
...Only to face defeat against me.

I'm different now, you know?
I no longer have any doubts.
The best defense is a good 
offense!
I believe in those words, 
and I'll prove it!

original:
………

...How to restore Aegisdramon?

You'll need a Yellow Patch.

First dive into the fountain over
at Packet Coast.
Then find the Patch and bring it 
back to Aegisdramon.
That's all...
translation:
………

...How to restore Aegisdramon?

You'll need a Yellow Patch.

First dive into the fountain over
at Packet Coast.
Then find the Patch and bring it 
back to Aegisdramon.
That's all...

original:
Even if I focus solely on pure, raw
power...
Without a good defense, 
it's all pointless...
I'm still a little speechless...
translation:
Even if I focus solely on pure, raw
power...
Without a good defense, 
it's all pointless...
I'm still a little speechless...

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Yellow Patch
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Yellow Patch

original:
^P! I've been looking all
over for you! So how'd it go??
Is he head over heels for me??
He wants to date right away??
Oh my! What am I to do!
Of course he said that, right??
translation:
^P! I've been looking all
over for you! So how'd it go??
Is he head over heels for me??
He wants to date right away??
Oh my! What am I to do!
Of course he said that, right??

original:
...What?

You're saying I made a fool of 
myself?
Jeez! Now you've just wasted
my time!
I'll just go hear it straight from
the wonderful man, himself!
translation:
...What?

You're saying I made a fool of 
myself?
Jeez! Now you've just wasted
my time!
I'll just go hear it straight from
the wonderful man, himself!

original: Out of my way!
translation: Out of my way!

original:
What do you mean?!
There must be some mistake!
Maybe I may have done something
a little unappealing, but...
Surely you must like me!

After all, I'm such a stunning
woman!
translation:
What do you mean?!
There must be some mistake!
Maybe I may have done something
a little unappealing, but...
Surely you must like me!

After all, I'm such a stunning
woman!

original:
But you see... When you say that...
Ummm...
translation:
But you see... When you say that...
Ummm...

original:
If you have something to say, then
hurry up and say it!
translation:
If you have something to say, then
hurry up and say it!

original:
And what're YOU looking at?!
You're getting on my nerves!
I'm gonna give each and every one
of you the beating you deserve!
translation:
And what're YOU looking at?!
You're getting on my nerves!
I'm gonna give each and every one
of you the beating you deserve!

original:
What was I doing, again...
Was I angry for some reason...?
translation:
What was I doing, again...
Was I angry for some reason...?

original: U-ummm...?
translation: U-ummm...?

original:
I-I'm awfully sorry, but you and I...
We can't be together...
You're just...
Too scary...
translation:
I-I'm awfully sorry, but you and I...
We can't be together...
You're just...
Too scary...

original:
Looks like I've finally awoken.

How strange... I was looking at 
such a wonderful man, earlier.
As I thought, my partner must be
someone strong!
Alright, ^P, I'll be going
back now.
translation:
Looks like I've finally awoken.

How strange... I was looking at 
such a wonderful man, earlier.
As I thought, my partner must be
someone strong!
Alright, ^P, I'll be going
back now.

original:
If you want to pass, you'll need
to answer my quiz!
Here comes the question!

How many eyes do I have?
translation:
If you want to pass, you'll need
to answer my quiz!
Here comes the question!

How many eyes do I have?

original: You've got 10, right?
translation: You've got 10, right?

original:
Wrong!

Too bad! The answer isn't one!
Try again next time!
translation:
Wrong!

Too bad! The answer isn't one!
Try again next time!

original:
Wrong!

What made you think that??
Two isn't correct!
Try again next time!
translation:
Wrong!

What made you think that??
Two isn't correct!
Try again next time!

original:
Correct!

Is what I'd like to say...
But you're wrong!
I have another eye deep within
my soul, you know!
Too bad for you!
translation:
Correct!

Is what I'd like to say...
But you're wrong!
I have another eye deep within
my soul, you know!
Too bad for you!

original:
Whaaat?!

I can't imagine having so many
eyes!
That's certainly something I
need to consider more!
In any case, I'm not letting you
pass!
translation:
Whaaat?!

I can't imagine having so many
eyes!
That's certainly something I
need to consider more!
In any case, I'm not letting you
pass!

original:
So...
Are you gonna apologize to me?
translation:
So...
Are you gonna apologize to me?

original:
Whaaat? Gigimon's the one who's
gonna apologize, right?
He'll admit that I'm the stronger
one!
translation:
Whaaat? Gigimon's the one who's
gonna apologize, right?
He'll admit that I'm the stronger
one!

original:
I'm the stronger one!
Puttmon's totally pathetic!
Let's settle this with a fight!
translation:
I'm the stronger one!
Puttmon's totally pathetic!
Let's settle this with a fight!

original:
As you wish! I won't go easy on 
you, even if you cry, got it!?
translation:
As you wish! I won't go easy on 
you, even if you cry, got it!?

original: When did you get here?
translation: When did you get here?

original: Did you come here to stop us...?
translation: Did you come here to stop us...?

original:
I'm sorry... did I hurt you?

Now that we've fought, 
I finally understand.
Puttmon is the stronger one! Sorry
about what I said before.
translation:
I'm sorry... did I hurt you?

Now that we've fought, 
I finally understand.
Puttmon is the stronger one! Sorry
about what I said before.

original:
You're also strong, Gigimon!

I'm the one who should apologize.
Let's make up, okay?
translation:
You're also strong, Gigimon!

I'm the one who should apologize.
Let's make up, okay?

original:
Oh no! 
Andromon must be worried sick!
We'd better go back right away!
translation:
Oh no! 
Andromon must be worried sick!
We'd better go back right away!

original:
Thank you, ^P!

Andromon is waiting for us, so
we're gonna go back to the Base.
translation:
Thank you, ^P!

Andromon is waiting for us, so
we're gonna go back to the Base.

original:
One... Two...
It's still not enough!
I can't Digivolve with this Plate!
translation:
One... Two...
It's still not enough!
I can't Digivolve with this Plate!

original:
What? What do you want?
...You again?!
translation:
What? What do you want?
...You again?!

original:
Don't Digivolve using stolen Plates,
you say...?
What, you've come to preach at
me again??
I'm gonna Digivolve no matter what
method I have to use!
translation:
Don't Digivolve using stolen Plates,
you say...?
What, you've come to preach at
me again??
I'm gonna Digivolve no matter what
method I have to use!

original:
You think I'm gonna let you stop
me!?
You must be stuuupid!
translation:
You think I'm gonna let you stop
me!?
You must be stuuupid!

original:
GranDracmon's late...
I'm getting sick of waiting.
translation:
GranDracmon's late...
I'm getting sick of waiting.

original:
What? What??
You again?!
I haven't even done anything yet!

Or did you come to steal the Plate
I got?!
translation:
What? What??
You again?!
I haven't even done anything yet!

Or did you come to steal the Plate
I got?!

original:
You came because you were 
worried about me...?
translation:
You came because you were 
worried about me...?

original:
What? What??
You're one weird guy...
You don't need to fuss over me!
I can already Digivolve, after all!
Once I obtained GranDracmon's
Plate...
I'll be able to become a powerful
Digimon!
translation:
What? What??
You're one weird guy...
You don't need to fuss over me!
I can already Digivolve, after all!
Once I obtained GranDracmon's
Plate...
I'll be able to become a powerful
Digimon!

original: So you're Dracmon, huh?
translation: So you're Dracmon, huh?

original:
Yeah!
Give me the Plate you promised!
I've been following your every order
so you'd give it to me!
translation:
Yeah!
Give me the Plate you promised!
I've been following your every order
so you'd give it to me!

original:
Hm? Order?
What are you talking about?
translation:
Hm? Order?
What are you talking about?

original: This isn't what we promised!
translation: This isn't what we promised!

original:
Uhyahaha!
I didn't make any promises!
Still, you're tiny!
Absolutely pitiful!
I have an idea. If you can beat me,
then I'll give you a Plate!
Well, not like that'll ever happen!
Uhyahaha!
translation:
Uhyahaha!
I didn't make any promises!
Still, you're tiny!
Absolutely pitiful!
I have an idea. If you can beat me,
then I'll give you a Plate!
Well, not like that'll ever happen!
Uhyahaha!

original:
Even though I did the best I
could...
Urgh...!
translation:
Even though I did the best I
could...
Urgh...!

original:
Ah, you gonna cry?

Its your fault for being fooled!
It was a good time waster, though!
translation:
Ah, you gonna cry?

Its your fault for being fooled!
It was a good time waster, though!

original:
Uhyahaha!
You're gonna fight me, instead?
Fine by me! If you can somehow
win, I'll give you a Plate!
translation:
Uhyahaha!
You're gonna fight me, instead?
Fine by me! If you can somehow
win, I'll give you a Plate!

original:
Damn it!
That was a stupid promise...!
Fine, have a Bug Plate.
translation:
Damn it!
That was a stupid promise...!
Fine, have a Bug Plate.

original:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
GranDracmon
translation:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
GranDracmon

original:
I don't have any Bug Plates, jeez!

I haven't done anything bad!
translation:
I don't have any Bug Plates, jeez!

I haven't done anything bad!

original: What? What??
translation: What? What??

original: You defeated GranDracmon??
translation: You defeated GranDracmon??

original:
Handed over Bug Plate
GranDracmon
translation:
Handed over Bug Plate
GranDracmon

original:
...I never even asked you to do this
for me...
But... you're giving this Plate 
to me...?
translation:
...I never even asked you to do this
for me...
But... you're giving this Plate 
to me...?

original:
Yeah! I did it!

With this in the Evolution Tree, I'll
finally achieve my Mega Form!
translation:
Yeah! I did it!

With this in the Evolution Tree, I'll
finally achieve my Mega Form!

original:
I won't go thanking you, you know!
But... you're not such a bad guy.
...Just joking!
translation:
I won't go thanking you, you know!
But... you're not such a bad guy.
...Just joking!

original: Hehehe...
translation: Hehehe...

original: Try and... catch... me...
translation: Try and... catch... me...

original: Hehe... he...
translation: Hehe... he...

original:
I've been... waiting...
I've been waiting... all this time...
Hehehe...
translation:
I've been... waiting...
I've been waiting... all this time...
Hehehe...

original: Hehe... hehehe...!
translation: Hehe... hehehe...!

original: Let's play!
translation: Let's play!

original: Ouch...
translation: Ouch...

original: I lost...
translation: I lost...

original: How boring...
translation: How boring...

original: Hmmm... So boring...
translation: Hmmm... So boring...

original:
I'm going home...
Say 'Hi' to Lilithmon for me.
translation:
I'm going home...
Say 'Hi' to Lilithmon for me.

original:
Hehehe...
Say 'Hi' to Lilithmon for me...
translation:
Hehehe...
Say 'Hi' to Lilithmon for me...

original:
What, did you come here for my 
treasure, too??
translation:
What, did you come here for my 
treasure, too??

original:
I see, I knew it! 
You're here for my treasure!
If you can overlook this,
I'll share some treasure with you!
translation:
I see, I knew it! 
You're here for my treasure!
If you can overlook this,
I'll share some treasure with you!

original:
I know! I'll give you some gold!

What do you think? We cool?
translation:
I know! I'll give you some gold!

What do you think? We cool?

original: Befriend a criminal?
translation: Befriend a criminal?

original: Don't befriend a criminal!
translation: Don't befriend a criminal!

original: Hmmm... I can't be your friend.
translation: Hmmm... I can't be your friend.

original:
I see! That so?
Then I won't show any mercy!
translation:
I see! That so?
Then I won't show any mercy!

original:
Very well then!
I'll just have to force your silence!
translation:
Very well then!
I'll just have to force your silence!

original:
Grrr...
To think Tamers are this strong...
translation:
Grrr...
To think Tamers are this strong...

original:
If you'd joined me, we could have
made tons of bank!
translation:
If you'd joined me, we could have
made tons of bank!

original: Damn it! I'm leaving!
translation: Damn it! I'm leaving!

original:
What a shame...
You really don't wanna join me?
translation:
What a shame...
You really don't wanna join me?

original: Hmph!
translation: Hmph!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Golden Mask
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Golden Mask

original:
^P!
Ready to go?
translation:
^P!
Ready to go?

original:
Oh! You're raring to go, huh?
Then, first up is these two!
translation:
Oh! You're raring to go, huh?
Then, first up is these two!

original: Fight hard 'till the bitter end!
translation: Fight hard 'till the bitter end!

original:
Since this is special training, 
I won't be holding back!
translation:
Since this is special training, 
I won't be holding back!

original:
Then let's get started!
Ready... Go!
translation:
Then let's get started!
Ready... Go!

original:
Finish!

Great job!
translation:
Finish!

Great job!

original:
Way to go, ^P.

There aren't any Tamers quite
like you!
translation:
Way to go, ^P.

There aren't any Tamers quite
like you!

original:
You've gotten strong!
Let's do this again, sometime!
translation:
You've gotten strong!
Let's do this again, sometime!

original:
Anyways, we should be heading 
back, now.
translation:
Anyways, we should be heading 
back, now.

original:
When we get back, we're gonna
have to train a lot harder.
We won't lose to you again,
^P!
translation:
When we get back, we're gonna
have to train a lot harder.
We won't lose to you again,
^P!

original:
It was fun! 
But we won't lose next time!
translation:
It was fun! 
But we won't lose next time!

original: See you around!
translation: See you around!

original:
You really are an incredible Tamer,
^P.
Continue growing stronger, got it!
translation:
You really are an incredible Tamer,
^P.
Continue growing stronger, got it!

original:
This is where golden-clad Digimon
gather.
If you want to join, you must also
be golden-clad.
And... you must be strong!

Are you strong?
translation:
This is where golden-clad Digimon
gather.
If you want to join, you must also
be golden-clad.
And... you must be strong!

Are you strong?

original:
You may not be golden-clad, but I
admire your enthusiasm!
Let's fight!
translation:
You may not be golden-clad, but I
admire your enthusiasm!
Let's fight!

original:
You have golden talent, that's for
sure.
But... You've still got a long way
ahead of you, haven't you?
translation:
You have golden talent, that's for
sure.
But... You've still got a long way
ahead of you, haven't you?

original:
In that case, go forth!
I'll go on ahead!
translation:
In that case, go forth!
I'll go on ahead!

original:
My golden-clad body is number one
in this world... maybe.
But to be the best in the world also
requires top strength!
If you want to pass through,
you'll need to beat me, first!
translation:
My golden-clad body is number one
in this world... maybe.
But to be the best in the world also
requires top strength!
If you want to pass through,
you'll need to beat me, first!

original:
Hmph! You may not be golden-clad,
but you're certainly strong!
Do you intend on continuing?
translation:
Hmph! You may not be golden-clad,
but you're certainly strong!
Do you intend on continuing?

original:
Aren't you brave!

Then I shall go on ahead.
translation:
Aren't you brave!

Then I shall go on ahead.

original:
You see my beautiful golden-clad
shell? Don't you get it??
Take a look! The shine on this part
is completely different to this part!
translation:
You see my beautiful golden-clad
shell? Don't you get it??
Take a look! The shine on this part
is completely different to this part!

original:
You... you don't get it?!

You're deplorable!
I'll have to teach you a lesson!
translation:
You... you don't get it?!

You're deplorable!
I'll have to teach you a lesson!

original:
You're quite powerful!
In that case...
Would you like to continue forward
and see someone even more golden?
translation:
You're quite powerful!
In that case...
Would you like to continue forward
and see someone even more golden?

original:
That's it! You understand what 
makes being golden-clad so great!
The legendary golden-clad Digimon
is just beyond here.
translation:
That's it! You understand what 
makes being golden-clad so great!
The legendary golden-clad Digimon
is just beyond here.

original:
You've done well coming this far!
I am the legend itself!
Let me guess...

You'd like a golden shine greater
than any other, correct?
translation:
You've done well coming this far!
I am the legend itself!
Let me guess...

You'd like a golden shine greater
than any other, correct?

original:
Very well...
Let us begin!
translation:
Very well...
Let us begin!

original:
Look at that!
That strength! That shine!
Your body may not be golden...
But you sure do shine!
translation:
Look at that!
That strength! That shine!
Your body may not be golden...
But you sure do shine!

original:
Being golden-clad is great, though
a little heavy.
translation:
Being golden-clad is great, though
a little heavy.

original:
Anyway, would you like to try on
some gold?
translation:
Anyway, would you like to try on
some gold?

original:
Would you like me to lend you my
golden crown?
translation:
Would you like me to lend you my
golden crown?
